name: feedback_id
description: Unique identifier for the feedback entry.

name: purchase_id
description: Type of product or service the feedback is related to.

name: product_id
description: Category of the feedback.

name: category
description: Name of the customer providing the feedback.

name: product_name
description: Name of the product or service related to the feedback.

name: brand
description: Brand name of the product or service.

name: size
description: Size of the product, if applicable.

name: color
description: Color of the product, if applicable.

name: type
description: Type of feedback (e.g., review, complaint, suggestion).

name: customers_name
description: Name of the customer providing the feedback.

name: customers_email
description: Email address of the customer providing the feedback.

name: rating
description: Rating given by the customer (e.g., 1-5 stars).

name: title
description: Title of the feedback.

name: comment
description: Comment provided by the customer.

name: purchase_date
description: Date when the product or service was purchased.

name: verified_purchase
description: Indicates if the purchase was verified.

name: would_recommend
description: Indicates if the customer would recommend the product.

name: company_response
description: Timestamp when the company responded to the feedback.

name: response_date
description: Date when the customer received a response from the company.

name: fb_date
description: Date when the feedback was submitted.
